nodes.text: American Graffiti: George Lucas' First Blockbuster

"American Graffiti: George Lucas' First Blockbuster" is an article' written by Kevin Fitzpatrick which appeared inside the magazine Star Wars Insider 30. The article narrated how the success of American Graffiti enabled George Lucas to make the Star Wars movies. The article also showed how the career of the stars of American Graffiti fared in the latter years.
